ca.ualberta.cs.technologic

Class Borrow

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.technologic.Borrow

  • public class Borrow
extends java.lang.Object
    When a bid is accepted it is turned into a borrow which contians the same information as bid as well as a meeting place and a time
